MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to carry out safe repair work to an underground cable fault on Woodmill Crescent, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:35am to additional properties in the area. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team are also working in conjunction with Scottish Water, we expect to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:38am on 6th February.
